page.title: 06RECREATION
page.content: The provision of{leisure}facilities varies according to age. For the 5_11 age group there are playgroups and {playschemes}although they are insufficient in numbers. The teenage element of the community is severely neglected. Community Centres provide discos as well as sporting facilities, but there is no large sports centre, the nearest being in Greenock. For many teenagers there is little to do, and boredom can set in. Adults being old enough to take alcohol have hotels, pubs and clubs for{recreation}but this is about all. The elderly are catered for mainly by {churches}and other religious organisations. The scope for recreation is not enough. There should be a review of the recreation system and vast improvements made.s
